Montebello.KLAC: KLAC AM 570 is a radio station serving the Los Angeles metropolitan area. KLAC is one of eight Los Angeles radio stations in which San Antonio-based iHeartMedia (formerly Clear Channel Communications until September 2014) has an ownership interest. The station is co-located with its sister stations in suburban Burbank, and its transmitter is located on a site in the Lincoln Heights neighborhood of Los Angeles, east of downtown.
